instructions: Open the Camera app on your iPhone. Tap the rotate icon to switch to the front-facing iPhone camera. Swipe along the menu at the bottom of the screen until you get to the Slo-Mo setting. Record your video as usual. Once you re done, your slofie video will be available within the Photos app and can be edited, watched, or shared just like other videos you ve made.

Open the Camera app and record your selfie video as usual. Once you're done, close the Camera app and open iMovie. Tap + to start a new project. Tap Movie . Tap on the video you want to edit. Tap the video timeline to bring up the edit tools. Tap the clock icon. Drag the speed marker towards the tortoise to create the slo mo camera effect. Tap Done . Tap the share icon to send your new slofie to an app or to save it to your device.
